name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Lubbock West

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a fine hotel, nearly new and comfortable, but I wouldn't recommend it. It's hard to find and hard to get to because it sits off the ramp at the intersection of two control access highways. You'll need GPS or printed directions, and it still isn't easy since line-of-sight is hard to establish.
reviews.title: You have better options

reviews.text: Nothing is nearby, so dinner is an adventure. The desk clerk was unable to recommend any place close, and unable to give directions out of the maze.
reviews.title: Great place to stay. New very updated! Great staff!

aka: Holiday Inn Express Hotel And Suites Lubbock West
description: Wide-open skies and rugged landscape characterize this region, known as the South Plains. Growing larger each year, this bustling city still retains its West Texas charm, and when you stay at our hotel's facility in Lubbock, we'll make sure you get a big dose of Southern hospitality. Because we're right off Highway 82, we're just minutes from Covenant Medical Center, Texas Tech University and the businesses of downtown Lubbock. The hotel's staff is also happy to assist if you need to host a seminar or gathering in one of the event rooms. To prepare for the meeting, feel free to use the Business Center and the complimentary wireless HSIA. While you compare hotels in Lubbock, keep in mind that we're just moments from South Plains Mall and short walk from Canyon West Shopping Center. For more information on the city's history visit the National Ranching Heritage Center or the Buddy Holly Center. Our accommodations are also close to Main Event, Joyland Amusement Park, the Depot District and the American Wind Power Center. The Holiday Inn Express® Lubbock West hotel has premium amenities at a price you can afford. Sample all your breakfast favorites at the free, hot Express Start Breakfast Bar before exploring Lubbock, or hit the hotel's Fitness Center for an invigorating workout. Visit us on your next trip and enjoy unique features like our aquarium that houses a catfish named Paws.
